description: Manim 영상용 SVG 아이콘 생성 프롬프트 (미생성 항목만)

prompts.prompt: Minimalist checkmark icon. Simple geometric design with bold white stroke. Clean angular check shape (✓), thick lines. SVG format, 300x300px, transparent background, white stroke (#FFFFFF), stroke-width 36px, no fill, stroke-linecap round.

Minimalist X mark icon. Simple geometric design with bold white stroke. Clean diagonal cross shape (✗), thick lines. SVG format, 300x300px, transparent background, white stroke (#FFFFFF), stroke-width 36px, no fill, stroke-linecap round.

Minimalist empty circle icon. Simple geometric design with bold white stroke. Clean circular outline (○), no fill inside. SVG format, 300x300px, transparent background, white stroke (#FFFFFF), stroke-width 20px, no fill.
Minimalist filled circle icon. Simple geometric design. Clean solid circle (●), completely filled. SVG format, 300x300px, transparent background, white fill (#FFFFFF).

Minimalist infinity symbol icon for emphasis. Simple geometric design with bold white stroke. Clean figure-eight lying on its side (∞), thick smooth curves. SVG format, 300x300px, transparent background, white stroke (#FFFFFF), stroke-width 30px, no fill, stroke-linecap round.

Minimalist approximately equal symbol icon for emphasis. Simple geometric design with bold white stroke. Two wavy horizontal lines stacked (≈), thick smooth curves. SVG format, 300x300px, transparent background, white stroke (#FFFFFF), stroke-width 30px, no fill, stroke-linecap round.

Minimalist not equal symbol icon for emphasis. Simple geometric design with bold white stroke. Two horizontal lines with diagonal slash through them (≠), thick lines. SVG format, 300x300px, transparent background, white stroke (#FFFFFF), stroke-width 30px, no fill, stroke-linecap round.

Minimalist less than or equal symbol icon for emphasis. Simple geometric design with bold white stroke. Less than sign with horizontal line below (≤), thick lines. SVG format, 300x300px, transparent background, white stroke (#FFFFFF), stroke-width 30px, no fill, stroke-linecap round.

Minimalist greater than or equal symbol icon for emphasis. Simple geometric design with bold white stroke. Greater than sign with horizontal line below (≥), thick lines. SVG format, 300x300px, transparent background, white stroke (#FFFFFF), stroke-width 30px, no fill, stroke-linecap round.
Minimalist filled star icon. Simple geometric design. Clean 5-pointed star shape (★), completely filled, sharp points. SVG format, 300x300px, transparent background, white fill (#FFFFFF).

Minimalist empty star icon. Simple geometric design with bold white stroke. Clean 5-pointed star outline (☆), no fill inside, sharp points. SVG format, 300x300px, transparent background, white stroke (#FFFFFF), stroke-width 16px, no fill.
Minimalist filled heart icon. Simple geometric design. Clean heart shape (♥), completely filled, symmetrical. SVG format, 300x300px, transparent background, white fill (#FFFFFF).

Minimalist filled diamond icon. Simple geometric design. Clean diamond/rhombus shape (♦), completely filled, 45-degree rotated square. SVG format, 300x300px, transparent background, white fill (#FFFFFF).
Minimalist lightning bolt icon. Simple geometric design. Clean zigzag lightning shape (⚡), completely filled, sharp angles. SVG format, 300x300px, transparent background, white fill (#FFFFFF).

Minimalist warning triangle icon. Simple geometric design with bold white stroke. Equilateral triangle outline with exclamation mark inside (⚠), thick lines. SVG format, 300x300px, transparent background, white stroke (#FFFFFF), stroke-width 20px.

usage_notes: AI 도구(ChatGPT, Claude, Midjourney 등)에 프롬프트 입력하여 SVG 생성
